description: This file specifies the set of classes and properties used in the RDF/OWL version of POWDER documents.
label: POWDER-S Vocabulary

Processor.description: A software agent able to process POWDER documents.
Processor.label: POWDER processor

authenticate.description: A pointer to a document that describes how Description Resources created by a FOAF Agent or a DC Terms Agent may be authenticated
authenticate.label: authenticate

certified.description: A property that takes a Boolean value to declare whether the author of the data certifies the described resource.
certified.label: certified

certifiedby.description: A property that links a resource to a POWDER document that certifies it.
certifiedby.label: certified by

data_error.description: A property denoting a description of the specific error found in a given POWDER document.
data_error.label: data error

describedby.description: An RDF property to exactly match the describedby relationship type introduced in http://www.w3.org/TR/powder-dr/#assoc-linking and formally defined in appendix D of the same document, i.e. the relationship A 'describedby' B asserts that resource B provides a description of resource A. There are no constraints on the format or representation of either A or B, neither are there any further constraints on either resource.
describedby.label: described by

error_code.description: A property denoting the code of any error encountered by the POWDER processor.
error_code.label: error code

hasIRI.description: This property is meant to be used in OWL2 instead of wdrs:matchesregex. It denotes the string data range corresponding to a set of IRIs.
hasIRI.label: has IRI

issuedby.description: This property denotes the author of a POWDER document.
issuedby.label: issued by

logo.description: Points to a graphic summary for the resources in a given class. Typically, it is a logo denoting conformance of a given (set of) resource(s) to a given set of criteria.
logo.label: logo

matchesregex.description: This is the key 'include' property for IRI set definitions in POWDER-S. It is necessary to take account of the POWDER Semantic Extension to process this fully. The value is a regular expression that is matched against an IRI.
matchesregex.label: matches regular expression

notknownto.description: Property used in results returned from a POWDER Processor that has no data about the candidate resource. The value is the IRI of the processor.
notknownto.label: not known to

notmatchesregex.description: This is the key 'exclude' property for IRI set definitions in POWDER-S. It is necessary to take account of the POWDER Semantic Extension to process this fully. The value is a regular expression that is matched against an IRI.
notmatchesregex.label: matches regular expression

proc_error.description: A property denoting a description of the specific software error.
proc_error.label: processing error

sha1sum.description: Links to a Base64-encoded binary SHA-1 hash of the described resource. May be used by POWDER Processors when assessing trustworthiness of a DR.
sha1sum.label: SHA-1 sum

supportedby.description: A property that links a POWDER document to some other data source that supports the descriptions provided.
supportedby.label: supported by

tag.description: Property linking to a free-text tag which may include spaces.
tag.label: tag

text.description: This property provides a summary of the descriptorset that it annotates, suitable for display to end users.
text.label: text that may be displayed

validfrom.description: Provides a timestamp that a POWDER Processor may use when assessing trustworthiness of a POWDER document. Informally, a POWDER Processor should normally ignore data in the document before the given date.
validfrom.label: valid from

validuntil.description: Provides a timestamp that a POWDER Processor may use when assessing trustworthiness of a POWDER document. Informally, a POWDER Processor should normally ignore data in the document after the given date.
validuntil.label: valid until
